name: powerbi-news-tracker
description: Tracks the latest Power BI and Microsoft Fabric updates, new features, API changes, and best practices from official Microsoft sources.
author: FabioBot

tools.name: get_powerbi_updates
tools.description: Fetch the latest Power BI and Fabric news, feature announcements, and release notes from official Microsoft blogs and documentation

max_items.description: Maximum number of items to return (default: 10, max: 25)

tools.name: get_powerbi_feature_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Power BI or Fabric feature, including documentation links and usage examples

feature_name.description: Name or keyword of the feature to look up (e.g. 'direct lake', 'copilot', 'PBIR format', 'datamarts')

tools.name: get_fabric_api_changelog
tools.description: Get recent changes to the Microsoft Fabric and Power BI REST APIs - new endpoints, deprecations, and breaking changes

since_days.description: Number of days to look back for changes (default: 30, max: 90)

tools.name: get_dax_reference
tools.description: Look up DAX functions, patterns, and best practices. Useful for building measures in semantic models

query.description: DAX function name or pattern to look up (e.g. 'CALCULATE', 'time intelligence', 'SUMMARIZECOLUMNS')
